sentences.en: A change of ownership might improve things.
sentences.cn: 改变所有权也许能使情况改善。

sentences.en: a dispute over the ownership of the land
sentences.cn: 关于土地所有权的纠纷
拥有房屋所有权人数的增多

sentences.en: Brazil says its constitution forbids the private ownership of energy assets.
sentences.cn: 巴西称其宪法禁止个人占有能源资产。

sentences.en: During that time, ownership or operation may change several times.
sentences.cn: 在这期间.物主和业务可能数次更改.

sentences.en: Gun ownership by law-abiding people was not a problem.
sentences.cn: 让守法的人持有枪械并不会惹麻烦。

sentences.en: He claimed ownership of the house.
sentences.cn: 他声称那幢房子归他所有.

sentences.en: He was chafing under the company's new ownership.
sentences.cn: 他在新老板的手下工作得很不开心。

sentences.en: Home ownership has been an overarching and innate desire of the British.
sentences.cn: 拥有私宅是所有英国人心中压倒一切和根深蒂固的强烈愿望。

sentences.en: Ownership is not clear because of expropriations in the Nazi era.
sentences.cn: 纳粹时期的征用致使所有权不明确。

sentences.en: So far no authoritative figures are available as to the persent telephone ownership in this city.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止,此城市电话的拥有数量尚无官方统计数字.

sentences.en: The house is under new ownership.
The matter in dispute is the ownership of the house.
sentences.cn: 眼下的纠纷是这所房子的所有权问题.

sentences.en: The matter in dispute over trifles is the ownership of the house.
sentences.cn: 眼下扯皮的事是这所房子该归谁.

sentences.en: The ownership of the island has long been established beyond dispute.
sentences.cn: 该岛的归属早已确定无疑.

sentences.en: The ownership of the restaurant is disputed.
sentences.cn: 那餐厅的所有权有争议.

sentences.en: The price of home ownership is increasing.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 购置成本；经营成本
（美国国内税务署批准的）职工股票所有权计划
n. 所有权证书；船舶执照
所有者权益；所有权权益
获得所有权；取得拥有权；全心地投入
